QuestData.Title: To the Cliffs
QuestData.Description: I sent Scout Brax forward along the road to the cliffs overlooking the beach to the west.$B$BI am going to put you onto Bastia. Travel down the path and let Brax know that we are going to take a different route.$B$BWe'll see you at the attack on the Alliance beachhead!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Scout Brax on the path down the cliffs north of the Savage Glen on the Lost Isles.
QuestData.RewardText: Hello, little goblin. Bastia is fast, no?$B$BWe have something very important that needs doing. Can you help us?
